comment.body:
> @hazemantr217 Hi. Cannot visit this site.
> Details
> 
> ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/229086549-621056fd-19aa-4d4e-aa8c-975be613e3ea.png)

It's working for me now in Egypt...but when I turned on the vpn, I got the same message (access denied). It seems that the owner of the site controls the IP addresses that can be accessed or not.
